**Izikhundla Zezinwadi**

Emazweni aseNtshonalanga, izikhundla zezinwadi ngokuvamile zithathwa njengomsebenzi wemfundo kanye nomsebenzi ohloniphekile. Emazweni ase-Arabhu, izikhundla zezinwadi zidlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekugcineni ulwazi lwesiko kanye nezinganekwane zomlando. Noma kunjalo, izikhundla zezinwadi emazweni ase-Arabhu ziba nezizathu ezihlukile ezibenza zibaluleke kakhulu, okuhlanganisa izikhumbuzo zomlando kanye neqhaza elikhulu ekukhuliseni ikhono lokufunda nokubhala kwezizukulwane ezizayo.

Ngaphandle kwalokho, uma sicabanga ngezinguquko ezinkulu, ezifana nokufika kobuchwepheshe, izikhundla zezinwadi ziye zaba nemiphumela ehlukahlukene. Emazweni aseNtshonalanga, ukufika kwe-inthanethi nezinzuzo zobuchwepheshe kwenze izikhundla zezinwadi zaba nezindlela ezintsha zokugcina ulwazi, ezifana nezincwadi eziku-inthanethi. Kodwa-ke, emazweni ase-Arabhu, izikhundla zezinwadi ziye zaqhubeka nokubamba iqhaza elibalulekile ekugcineni iziko, ngenkathi futhi zinciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela zobuchwepheshe.

**Umkhiqizo Womndeni**

Umkhiqizo womndeni uyingxenye ebalulekile yezizathu zokugcina iziko kuzo zombili izifunda. Emazweni aseNtshonalanga, umkhiqizo womndeni ungaba yizinkampani ezinkulu noma amathuba okuzimela. Emazweni ase-Arabhu, ukuhweba komndeni kuyindlela ebalulekile yokugcina iziko, kanti umkhiqizo womndeni uyisikhumbuzo samasiko kanye nezindlela zokuphila. Lokhu kubonakala emikhakheni efana nezolimo, izandla zomsebenzi, kanye nokuhweba.

Nokho, ukuvela kwezinkampani ezinkulu kanye namabhizinisi amakhulu emazweni aseNtshonalanga kube nomthelela ekuguqukeni kwamasiko omlando womkhiqizo womndeni. Emazweni ase-Arabhu, ukuhweba komndeni kuye kwagcina izindinganiso zamasiko ngenkathi kubhekana nezinguquko ezinkulu zamanje. Lokhu kuphambene nokuxhumana kwezinye izifunda, lapho amandla ezinkampani ezinkulu kunciphise umthelela womkhiqizo womndeni.

**Ukugcina Ukholo**

Ukugcina ukholo kuyinto ebalulekile kwizifunda zaseNtshonalanga nezase-Arabhu. Emazweni aseNtshonalanga, ukuhamba kwesikhathi kanye nezinguquko ezinkulu ziye zanciphisa umthelela omkhulu wezenkolo ezimpilweni zabantu. Emazweni ase-Arabhu, ukholo ludlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu, futhi izenzo zenkolo ziba yingxenye ebalulekile yokuphila kwansuku zonke. Izindawo zokukhonza zithathwa njengendawo ebalulekile yokuxhumana neyokugcina iziko. Ukuhamba kwesikhathi nezinguquko ezinkulu, ezifana nokufika kwamabhizinisi amakhulu kanye nezindlela zabaphesheya, ziye zaguqula izindlela zokugcina ukholo, kodwa zange zinciphise ukubaluleka kwazo ekugcineni iziko.

**Ukuxhumana Nokuzithanda**

Ukuxhumana phakathi kwalezi zifunda kuye kwaba nezindlela ezahlukene zokuzithanda. Emazweni aseNtshonalanga, ukuhlangana phakathi kwemimoya yobuchwepheshe kanye namasiko omlando kuye kwaholela ekutheni kube nokulahleka kwezindlela ezimbalwa zendabuko, kodwa kube nemiphumela emihle ekuthuthukiseni izindlela ezintsha zokuxhumana.

Emazweni ase-Arabhu, ukuxhumana phakathi kwamasiko omlando kanye nezinguquko zamanje kuye kwaholela ekugcineni iziko kanye nokwandisa izindlela zokuxhumana. Lokhu kubonakala ngokubambisana kwamabhizinisi amancane kanye nezinkampani ezinkulu, kanye nokugcinwa kwezikhumbuzo zamasiko.

**Isiphetho**

Ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi izikhundla zezinwadi, umkhiqizo womndeni, nokugcina ukholo kuyizinto ezibalulekile ekugcineni iziko ezizweni zaseNtshonalanga nezase-Arabhu. Lezi zinto ziqinisekisa ukuthi iziko nezinqumo ezinkulu zokuguquka zihlala zibalulekile futhi zisebenza ngokubambisana.

**Izwi Lomphakathi: Ukushaywa Indlwabu Kokukhuluma**

Emiphakathini yase-Arabhu, isiko lokuqothulwa kwezitho zangasese zamantombazane (FGM) liyaqhubeka, ligcinwa njengomgomo wokugcina ukuhlonipha nokuhlonishwa komndeni. Kodwa-ke, isiko elinjalo alilethi inzuzo yezokwelapha futhi lihlala libusha ukhonkolo lobuhlungu, imizwa engapheliyo, kanye nokuphila okungaphephile kwabesifazane abasha. 

Ngokujwayelekile, abesifazane abancane bahlukunyezwa kulolu hlobo lokucwasa, lapho amantombazane ezwa ubuhlungu obukhulu obungenakulinganiswa, obuhambisana nobuhlungu obujulile bokuziphatha nempilo yabo yonke. Lokhu kuhlukunyezwa, okuvamise ukwenzeka ngaphandle kokuhlinzwa okwanele nokunakekelwa kwezokwelapha, kubeka abesifazane engcupheni enkulu yezifo ezihlobene nokuvuvukala, ukuvuvukala kwezitho zangasese, kanye nobuhlungu obungapheliyo ngesikhathi sokuhamba kwesikhathi.

Ngaphandle kokuhlangabezana nezimo ezimbi zomzimba, abesifazane abaye bahlukunyezwa ngalolu hlobo bahlushwa imiphumela emibi ngokomqondo nangokomzwelo. Amanxeba angabonakali akhishwa ngalesi senzo anomthelela omubi empilweni yabo yonke. Ukuzizwa benezibazi, ukulahlekelwa ukuzithanda, kanye nokuhlezi bekhumbula ubuhlungu obudluleyo kuyizinto ezisindayo ezingapheli. Lokhu kuvimbela intuthuko kanye nokuzimela kwabesifazane, kubavala iminyango eminingi yokuthuthuka empilweni yabo.

Ngokwesiko, umphakathi uvame ukubopha izandla zabazali, ubaphoqa ukuthi bahambe ngethuba lokuhlukunyezwa kwamantombazane abo ngenxa yokwesaba ukukhishwa emphakathini. Lokhu kugqama njengoba izimfundiso zamasiko esakaza umbono wokuthi ukuhlonipheka komndeni kuncike kulesi senzo. Lokhu kufaka umthwalo omkhulu emindenini, kubenza bazizwe bengaphephile uma bezama ukuphikisa isiko elingalungile.

Isikhathi sesifikile sokushayela phansi le ndlela eyimpazamo yokuphila. Ukugqugquzela ulwazi lokuthi FGM ayinazo izinzuzo eziphathekayo zezokwelapha kumele kube yinjongo yomphakathi jikelele. Ukukhuluma ngalesi sihlungu nokugxeka lo mcabango kumele kube yingxenye yengxoxo emikhulu yokukhululeka kwabantu besifazane nokubatholela impilo enempilo nengcono.

Ukubona izinguquko ezinhle, kuyadingeka ukuthi singene emgomweni wokubambisana, sihlanganyele emfundisweni esisekelwe olwazini nangokwelapha, siqinisekise ukuthi siyasusa zonke izithiyo ezibandakanya ukuthula, ukuhlonipha kanye nokukhululeka kwabantu besifazane abasha. Futhi masikhumbule ukuthi, njengomphakathi, sinomthwalo wokukhetha uhlobo olungcono lwekusasa, lapho amantombazane ethu engakhuluma, engakhula, futhi engaphila ngaphandle kokwesaba, ukuhlukunyezwa, kanye nobuhlungu obungenasidingo.

Ngakho-ke, masivuke, siphakamise amazwi ethu, futhi sinqobe le ndlela eyimpazamo yokuphila. FGM ayinayo indawo emphakathini okhululekile nowuhloniphayo. Iphupho lethu kufanele libe elomphakathi lapho wonke umuntu azizwa ephephile futhi ekhule ngokugcwele, ngaphandle kokucindezelwa yizimfundiso ezingalungile.
